meico.mpm.elements

Class Performance

  • java.lang.Object
    • meico.xml.AbstractXmlSubtree
      • meico.mpm.elements.Performance

  • public class Performance
extends AbstractXmlSubtree
    This class represents an mpm performance. One mpm document can hold several performances.
    Author:
    Axel Berndt.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private Global global 
      private nu.xom.Attribute name 
      private java.util.ArrayList<Part> parts 
      private int pulsesPerQuarter 

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private Performance(nu.xom.Element xml)
      this constructor instantiates the Performance object from an existing xml source handed over as XOM Element
      private Performance(java.lang.String name)
      This constructor generates an empty performance with only a name, global and dated environment.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static GenericMap addMsmMapToList(java.lang.String mapName, nu.xom.Element msmDated, java.util.ArrayList<GenericMap> list)
      a helper method to retrieve a certain map from an msm dated environment, generate a GenericMap object from it and add it to a LinkedList; this simplifies code in method perform()
      void addPart(Part part)
      add the part to the performance, caution: if another part with the same number exists already in this performance, getPart(number) will return only the first
      static Performance createPerformance(nu.xom.Element xml)
      performance factory
      static Performance createPerformance(java.lang.String name)
      performance factory
      java.util.ArrayList<Part> getAllParts()
      this returns all parts in this performance as an ArrayList
      Global getGlobal()
      access the global information of this performance
      java.lang.String getName()
      a getter for the performance's name
      Part getPart(int number)
      Access the part with the specified number.
      Part getPart(int midiChannel, int midiPort)
      Access the part by its MIDI channel and port If there are more than one part with this channel and port (which is bad practise!)
      Part getPart(java.lang.String name)
      Access the part with the specified name.
      int getPPQ()
      read the pulses per quarter timing resolution (relevant for to interpret midi.date values)
      int getPulsesPerQuarter()
      read the pulses per quarter timing resolution (relevant for to interpret midi.date values)
      protected void parseData(nu.xom.Element xml)
      set the data of this performance, this parses the xml element and generates the according data structure
      Msm perform(Midi midi)
      this generates an Msm object from the input midi data and adds expression data (such as millisecond dates, durations, and velocity values) to it; performance rendering will keep MIDI compliance
      Msm perform(Msm msm)
      this add expression data (such as millisecond dates, durations, and velocity values) to the specified MSM
      void removePart(int number)
      remove all parts with the specified number from this performance
      void removePart(Part part)
      remove the specified part from this performance
      void removePart(java.lang.String name)
      remove all parts with the specified name from this performance
      void setName(java.lang.String name)
      set the performance's name, if the performance is already part of an mpm it should be removed and re-added to make sure that it can be found under the new name
      void setPPQ(int ppq)
      Set the pulses per quarter timing resolution attribute.
      void setPulsesPerQuarter(int ppq)
      Set the pulses per quarter timing resolution attribute.
      int size()
      get the number of parts in this performance

      • getPart

        public Part getPart(int midiChannel,
                    int midiPort)
        Access the part by its MIDI channel and port If there are more than one part with this channel and port (which is bad practise!), the first in the list is returned.
        Parameters:
        midiChannel -
        midiPort -
        Returns:

      • setPulsesPerQuarter

        public void setPulsesPerQuarter(int ppq)
        Set the pulses per quarter timing resolution attribute. Be careful with this, it does not change any midi date values!
        Parameters:
        ppq -

      • perform

        public Msm perform(Midi midi)
        this generates an Msm object from the input midi data and adds expression data (such as millisecond dates, durations, and velocity values) to it; performance rendering will keep MIDI compliance
        Parameters:
        midi -
        Returns:
        an augmented MSM with performance related data

      • perform

        this add expression data (such as millisecond dates, durations, and velocity values) to the specified MSM
        Parameters:
        msm -
        Returns:
        an augmented MSM with performance related data

        private static GenericMap addMsmMapToList(java.lang.String mapName,
                                          nu.xom.Element msmDated,
                                          java.util.ArrayList<GenericMap> list)
        a helper method to retrieve a certain map from an msm dated environment, generate a GenericMap object from it and add it to a LinkedList; this simplifies code in method perform()
